TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QualifierData extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含 WMI 限定詞 (Qualifier) 的相關資訊。

span.span: Contains information about a WMI qualifier.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會列出有關的辨識符號資訊**Win32_Service**類別使用類別。The following example lists qualifier information about the **Win32_Service** class using the class. 如需詳細資訊**Win32_Service**，請參閱[Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page)文件。For more information about **Win32_Service**, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation. [!code-csharp[wminet_QualifierData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_QualifierData/cs/QualifierData.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_QualifierData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_QualifierData/vb/QualifierData.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAmended { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsAmended : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否要修改限定詞。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the qualifier is amended.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出限定詞是否已修改。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the qualifier is amended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 修改的限定詞是可當地語系化的值，透過 WMI 的限定詞。Amended qualifiers are qualifiers whose value can be localized through WMI. 當地語系化的限定詞位於不同的命名空間，在 WMI 中，且可合併到基本的類別定義擷取時。Localized qualifiers reside in separate namespaces in WMI and can be merged into the basic class definition when retrieved. ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果修改這個限定詞;否則， `false`。`true` if this qualifier is amended; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsLocal As Boolean
public: property bool IsLocal { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出限定詞是否已經在這個類別上區域地定義，或已經從基底類別 (Base Class) 傳播。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the qualifier has been defined locally on this class or has been propagated from a base class.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出限定詞是否已經在這個類別上區域地定義，或已經從基底類別傳播。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the qualifier has been defined locally on this class or has been propagated from a base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果限定詞已經在本機定義於此類別中;否則， `false`。`true` if the qualifier has been defined locally on this class; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出限定詞的值是否可以在傳播時覆寫。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of the qualifier can be overridden when propagated.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出限定詞的值是否可以在傳播時覆寫。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the value of the qualifier can be overridden when propagated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果傳播; 時，可以覆寫限定詞的值否則， `false`。`true` if the value of the qualifier can be overridden when propagated; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PropagatesToInstance { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PropagatesToInstance : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出限定詞是否應該傳播至類別的執行個體。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the qualifier should be propagated to instances of the class.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出限定詞是否應該傳播至類別的執行個體。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the qualifier should be propagated to instances of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果這個限定詞應該傳播至類別; 的執行個體否則， `false`。`true` if this qualifier should be propagated to instances of the class; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出限定詞是否應該傳播至類別的子類別。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the qualifier should be propagated to subclasses of the class.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出限定詞是否應該傳播至類別的子類別。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the qualifier should be propagated to subclasses of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果限定詞應該傳播至子類別，這個類別;否則， `false`。`true` if the qualifier should be propagated to subclasses of this class; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Value : obj with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定限定詞的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the qualifier.

value.span: 傳回 值，包含限定詞的值。

span.span: Returns an value containing the value of the qualifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 限定詞只能為 CIM 類型的下列子集： 字串、 uint16、 uint32、 sint32、 uint64、 sint64、 real32、 real64 或 bool。Qualifiers can only be of the following subset of CIM types: string, uint16, uint32, sint32, uint64, sint64, real32, real64, or bool. ## 屬性值Property Value 限定詞的值。The value of the qualifier. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會列出有關的辨識符號資訊**Win32_Service**類別使用類別。The following example lists qualifier information about the **Win32_Service** class using the class. 如需詳細資訊**Win32_Service**，請參閱[Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page)文件。For more information about **Win32_Service**, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation.
